## Color3.FromArray() method

Creates a new Vector3 from the starting index of the given array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromArray(array: ArrayLike<number>, offset?: number): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | defines the source array |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines an offset in the source array |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

a new Color3 object
